headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company Announces Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: GOLDEN, Colo. & MONTREAL, July 16, 2025--The Board of Directors of Molson Coors Beverage Company (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A) today declared a regular quarterly dividend on its Class A and Class B common stock of US$0.47 per share, payable September 19, 2025, to stockholders of record on September 5, 2025. The quarterly dividend is payable to holders of Class A and Class B common stock of Molson Coors Beverage Company.

headline: Molson Coors' Earnings Preview: What to Expect
summary: Molson Coors is set to report its second-quarter results next month, and analysts are projecting a single-digit decrease in profits.
